amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Water and Related Resources by $2 million and reduces funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount in order to allow the Bureau of Reclamation to proceed with water supply delivery projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Water and Related Resources by $2 million and to reduce funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Tipton.
